feed.title: Code from alloy
feed.subtitle: The Ruby libraries, from alloy, available as open-source projects

entry.title: microgem 0.2.0
entry.summary: MicroGem provides a simple naive replacement for the `gem install' command in the form of the `mgem' commandline utility.
entry.content: MicroGem provides a simple naive replacement for the `gem install' command in the form of the `mgem' commandline utility.

entry.title: dr-nic-magic-awesome 1.0.0
entry.content: A gem which summons Dr. Nic to fix all your projects while you are cuddled underneath your blankie.
